text: The role is a biology position in Eternity Bioscience Inc. located in Cranbury, NJ in the biology department.

strong: Perform a variety of in vitro pharmacological (mostly biochemical and cellular) assays to support multiple drug discovery projects, including but not limited to fluorescent, colorimetric or label-free enzymatic and binding kinetics assays, flow cytometry, ELISA, and protein production

li.1: Deliver high-quality and timely data to project teams
li.2: Present the work clearly in internal project meetings
li.3: Be flexible on other lab duties as assigned ad hoc

strong: BS/MS degree in biological sciences, preferably in cell biology, biochemistry, pharmacology, molecular biology or immunology, with drug discovery research experience desirable

li.1: Proficiency with data analysis programs, such as Excel and Prism
li.2: Ability to multitask and adhere to tight timelines
li.3: Ability to work in a diverse team setting and collaborate effectively on complex projects
li.4: Technical proficiency, ability to learn new techniques quickly, effective problem solving, and critical and quantitative thinking skills required
li.5: Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills

strong: An Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability
